item.description:
SATURDAY APRIL 28th UPDATE: THE ORGANIZER IS NOT ABLE TO MAKE IT DUE TO WORK CONFLICT - DOES ANYONE WANT TO TAKE OVER OR SHOULD IT BE RESCHEDULED FOR THURSDAY NIGHT 5/3 AT 6:30???

Let's meet for the first time and ride part of the Minuteman Trail. The event will start at the beginning of the trail in Arlington, and we'll ride for about an hour. As I've said before, I'm a newbie so any tips, suggestions, info, etc. would be greatly appreciated! Everyone can meet me at my car in the parking lot (a silver Scion tc).

After the event, we can go for an ice cream or iced coffee if anyone's up for it.

http://maps.yahoo.com...
item.name: Minuteman Monday Night Bikeride!
